title: Chaoji Xiaoxiong Bu Mi
synopsis: BOOMi (Chinese name cloth fan) is an imaginative super bear who likes to take his cute puppy bibop (Chinese name Bebu) on adventures. Bufan believes that he can do everything he can imagine, and he is obsessed with every role in the imagined world: astronaut, dinosaur hunter, ocean explorer, etc. For him, everything is possible. The cloth fans are active, smart, and curious, and always like to take their lovely partner bibop on every adventure. (traslated from qq)
